title: Mental Peace
review: The moment you enter this place you feel so much of peace and tranquility within your heart and soul that you are left speechless.

title: A township - spiritual and self contained
review: Gita Bhawan is a venture of the Gita Press Gorakhpur and houses ascetics and those who seek emancipation. Lot of people come here seeking to luberate themselves and lot of worship and tapasya on the banks of Maa Ganga. Hymns to Gods, simple food at affordable prices, dhyan or yoga and an opportunity to be in sync with the almighty and experience the spiritual thing. A great opportunity to open the door to the satisfied life with less of the I , me ,myself stuff. One can kind very rich people in service of humanity and the needy. Gita Bhawan is worth an experience - to live life with minimal needs, may be a dress on and one in bag and sleep in make shift arragnement if rooms are full. Survive on clean , hygenic meals at cheap rates and bathe in Ganga thrice a day. Listen to deovtional songs. Tempesl galore. Gita bhawan has a "sweet shop" which cooks mithais in deshi ghee and everything gets sold out from 6 am - 8 am....Gita Bhawan shops offer good ayurvedic products and diet for the soul in terms of spiritual books. One can stay here for months with least attachment - if one has that bent of mind,

title: Peace!!
review: there are guides available to walk you through different places of interest and importance of Swargasram, but what ever they convey is widely published in internet, if you do proper research and study, you can save some money in tour around swargashram....

title: Most Holy place near Ganga.
review: This Ashram is best and not like other ashram. You can stay here for free as they don't charge. But only families are allowed to get the room here.

title: Go go and go here
review: I visited Rishikesh with my family and stay here. It’s not like hotel. You’ll not get service like hotel. But the open space you’ll get is too good. Price is very reasonable. They have food provision as well. Ganga river is near by 1 min distance

title: GITA BHAVAN ,RISHIKESH
review: Gita Bhavan is an amazing place where Bagavad Gita is written in just two pages...all 18 chapters,apart from the rare Rudraksha Tree..Lord Krishna is all around with devotees allowed to come and stay,on first come first basus free of charge..a saintly life on the banks of Rishikesh!Fantastic place for people who love to live away from the maddening crowd of materialistic places on earth,provided you want a simple saintly life!

title: Hevean for a Krishna Devootee!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
review: If you take Bhagavadgeeta as your whole and sole manual for life, then this is the place to visit and stay.

title: Worth a visit
review: Geeta Bhavan is situated close to Ghats and has a large compound where devotees can stay at a nominal price , a canteen which serves really delicious food ( Desi ghee sweets in particular ) and a book centre and shopping place. Its almost on the banks of ganga in Swargashram area and hence very convenient for attending Aarti or taking dip in the holy water

title: Beautiful place. lot of devotion.. people were nice
review: Beautiful place. lot of devotion.. people were nice , busy place but very nice.. and all around the place there is a subtle devotion, no gimmick as in next door Parmarth Niketan.. Will come here again and again.

title: Such wholesome and nutritious prasad and such beautiful and true people that are a part of it
review: Gita bhavan is the finest example of our Indian teachings...simple living, everyone is equal, everything lies in the power of the supreme. The energy in the bhawan is so lovely and pure. And the Prasad served at such a nominal rate is cooked and served with such love that one feels nourished not just in the body but in the mind too. Speak to anyone out there and you will end up learning something more about life.

title: Peaceful place
review: Gita Bhavan is a branch of Geeta Press at Gorakhpur. The boondi ladoos of this place are made of pure ghee and really tasty. Also the book store has a huge variety of books.

title: The right place
review: Sure they are welcoming, quality of product sold here good, got a handicraft woolen jacket, good quality & comparative price

title: Gita Bhawan
review: This is a nice small place,, I visited it with a friend,, the people around are quite friendly. I will like to visit again

title: A place of worship ....
review: Although only visiting for the day, we found this temple to be educational.  The shrines and paintings provided us with insight to the cultural traditions.  As always, we find the people of India to be friendly, helpful, and deeply religious.  Hope to be back visiting again.

title: Best place to buy Gitas
review: Cheap books  from very small to large.  Plain or with pictures.  They have been providing as a service for almost 100 years

title: Culture
review: In India of late, Hindu culture has taken a beating. This place is a place that shows it in its glory. Please visit, donate and help such places promote culture.

title: Best Place
review: A place to sheer divinity. Must visit this place to take blessings of Bhagwad Purana. One should try to visit solo to absorb maximum blessings and inspiration.

title: Gangaarathy
review: It is the best place to visit around 6 PM and also watch ganga arathi on the banks of river ganga. a must for all travellers and if you have a guide to expalin the gita Bhavan it is very nice.

title: Good Place with History
review: Geeta Bhawan is very good place to visit with nature, peace and history. A guide needed to know the history with Geeta Bhawan.

title: Oldest Ashram to stay under a budget
review: Ahsram has several properties in Rishikesh to stay and out of main gate it has many shops for cloths, house needs, ayurveda and many more.

title: A charming simplicity
review: This place is full of positive vibes. Its an old but well maintained ashram offering free stay to devotees. Prayers and Bhagvat Gita readings go on here. even if you don"t wish to stay here, make a visit, go around the grounds and listen in on a religious discourse or simply take a round around the ancient Banyan tree, you shall surely come away with a sense of peace and purpose.

title: Old and big Ashram in Rishikesh
review: It is very big and old Ashram in Rishikesh near Ram Jhoola on the Bank of Ganga Ashram . With  temple .and lawn and also a small canteen.

title: Gita Bhavan
review: A must visit for all but along with a guide who can explain the relevance and take you around the place.

title: Good as ever
review: Popularity of this place has gone up and up. Apart from the rooms for pilgrims,they offer Hindu scriptures and other Pooja items, Khadi and other cloth, quality is good and prices reasonable. Visited a number of times and always bought something. Gentle people man the sale counters.

title: A great place - Gita Bhavan- a temple with a choultry
review: Gita bhavan, very close to Lakshman Jhula,in Rishikesh, is a huge complex of a temple cum choultry. Hundreds of devotees can stay here and have a great time in the holy place of Rishikesh. The rates are very normal and one has to book well in advance.

title: A tribute to Gita press
review: This attraction is near the Ramjhula, Rishikesh and is the branch office of Gita press, Gorakhpur,. It is adjacent to Parmarth Niketan, where the exhilarating Ganga Arathi is conducted every sunrise at Sunset.

title: Stay for Free in Rishikesh
review: If you are a devotee and want to spend sometime in tranquility, then this a perfect place to stay. Take a break from mundane life and come to Rishikesh, meet Mausaji of Gita Bhawan and request for room, you will not be disappointed. There are many Gita Bhawans No. 1, 2, 3, 4 & 5 I saw each having hundreds of rooms. At the main entrance are shops run by them where religious books, hand made cloths, ayurvedic medicines can be purchased - one dispensary too., In front of the main gate is Ganga Ghat well managed by them with security guards but free for all. It also runs a canteen which provides eatables to the visitors at reasonable rates.

title: one more great temple in rishikesh.
review: this temple is near to laxman jhula. a must visit place in rishikesh. you should take a guide who will explain properly

title: First Ashram over the Ganges
review: This is quite a small temple.  It has just over 1,100 rooms in which Indians, over 55 and single, can stay for free.

title: If you are in Rishikesh  for more than a day this is a place you can visit
review: Nothing special but walk around the place with a guide. The guide charge you only Rs.100. You will be greeted by a number of monkey.

title: Great for a flavour of north Indian savouries
review: Outstanding jalebi and kachoris in the morning. Grumpy staff but what the hell, it lends to the character.

title: good place
review: one more good temple in rishikesh. it is near laxmanjhula and it has rooms also for stay 1 or 2 night. very peaceful place. must visit place if you are going to laxman jhula

title: peaceful
review: one of the first ashrams  and perhaps the largest in rishkesh , gita bhawan is very popular with the tourists. on the banks of ganga, this has a very peaceful atmosphere. there is also a temple inside the complex.

title: Its my favorite
review: Its a worth visiting place. This place is real India. Visiting this place makes me to understand about India.

title: Big Ashram
review: Gita Bhavan is a very big Ashram most they are located in 5 places in same area.Good Garden & nice temple.Food is good @50. They do not charge for stay .Only condition is to attain there morning class of Bhagwat Gita.They mostly give for long stay .I stay for 5 days.They give me 2 BHK flat.All basic facility like gas & Vessels are also available on rent.

title: Good place to visit
review: Gita Bhavan is a big ashram with an excellent book stall. There's a nice garden where you can sit and meditate. It doesn't seem that they are so fond of the loudspeakers, which is a blessing. It's a good ashram to visit, though it's quite busy, so not as peaceful as it might be. Indians can stay, but I don't think foreigners can.

title: Its quite and peaceful.
review: We hardly spent 30 mins here but the place is quite and peaceful. Have provisions for staying over as well. Meditation in the gardens was being as we passed.

title: 40r thali!!
review: Hidden away in the corner of the ashram is a great canteen open at limited times 11am -12. 6:30-7:30pm.

title: Nice Ashram
review: Gita Ashram is on one side of Ram Jhula. Though we didn't stay here but we inquired about the price to stay here. You can get a room in Rs 500 per day depending on the availability. You can also visit temple and a small school inside the ashram.

title: Powerful statues
review: Visit this temple and spend some time in front of these two!

title: Mighty place to stay religiously and enjoy the dip in holy ganges
review: Gita Bhawan houses more than 1600 rooms in rishikesh. The entire Bhawan is made out if charity. Most of the donors are from state of Rajasthan in India. One enjoy the stay in holy environment and in the evening and morning ine can have dip in clean and holy ganges.

title: divine feeling
review: old room but with all basic facility at the heart of rishikesh the divine capital,with round the clock chanting of gita & other mantras

title: GITA ASHRAM
review: This Bhavan is situated on the other side of Ram Jula  or the other side of  River Ganges. Bagavat Gita is taught here .   The willing pilgrims are allowed to sty free of cost in this ashram and they are taught Bhavat Gita. A Beautiful  Lord Krishna temple  inside.

title: Peaceful place
review: Peaceful and relaxing place, wanna visit again with my family. Just on the bank of holy river GANGA. No noise and rush.

title: Nice place to live
review: Gita bhavan is quite old ashram on the bank of ganga at ram jhoola. The ashram runs lot of activities such as kirtans poojas pravachans,rented accomodations for devotees , free accomodation , dharmshalas,bookstalls cloth shops and the most attractive very cheap and good meals.The food items prepared in Deshi ghee are very popular and very cheap.So enjoy the sweets and prasads there.

title: Gorakhpur Press
review: Gita Bhavan is near to Ram Jhula and on the banks of River Ganaga. They have their book stall, ayurvedic shop, etc. set up here.

title: A treasure house!
review: Gita Bhavan is an old landmark in Rishikesh, I have been visiting this place since childhood. I love the collection of textiles it sells, especially good quality and reasonable priced variety of woolen shawls. I find the ayurvedic medicine shop very helpful and have bought Amla juice and honey from here. There is a lot to explore at Gita Bhavan and I hope to visit it more one day soon!

title: Interesting
review: Interesting place for those wanting to know about hindu religion and also picking up some souvenirs. I picked up a copy of Gita from here, was always curious to know about it.

title: Well thought Bhavan in old times
review: Gita Bhavan is very popular place for devotees who come to Rishikesh for spiritual reason, situated on bank of Ganga having 1200 rooms with paid dinning area. I don't understand why photography is not allowed inside, it has simple temples and very quite area..

title: Authentic Rishikesh sweets
review: We visited this place, thrice during our 9 days stay at Rishikesh. Breakfast- puries with sabji - only for ₹16 was unbelievable. Well  cooked.

title: Educational expereince for young children
review: I visited this place with my sister, a senior citizen and my daughter's family who had come from London. My sister had visited this place before and I found this an amazing place for learning for young children. My daughter had told stories about Lord Krishna to her children and I was pleasantly surprised that the place had great illustrations on the walls. There was one place where someone had condensed the whole of Bhagwat Gita on one page. The place is used as a learning centre and there are hundreds of rooms where people come to stay and learn about Bhagwad Gita. Our children were excited to see scores of wild monkeys who seemed to rule the place, no one turns them away.

title: nice place
review: it is a nice place to visit.  u get lot of inside peace.  when u r in there must visit.  market is also very close.

title: best place to buy clothing, towels,essential items
review: i always visit gita bhavan to buy new towels, cotton for sewing clothes, a cheap rug for my room.  very reasonably priced, nice shawls, helpful staff.

title: For retired people
review: If you want to die by the Ganges, this is a nice place to spend your final years. Otherwise, there's not much going on here.

title: nice long term stay for dedicated Bhaktas
review: Very nice, old facility for long term devotees and Bhakts.

title: tiny Gita to enjoy
review: The place has some unique stuff like a tiny geeta and a ridraksh tree. An ok place.We just stumbles upon it rather than hunting it down. u can give it a miss.

title: Nice place to visit in Rishikesh
review: Nice place to pass by when roaming around Ram jhula. This place is located in between Pramath Niketan and Ram jhula. The ambiance was soothing and there were many people at this place.

title: good place
review: Its a cool and calm place. Once you get tired from roaming, you can sit here. Outside the temple there is Geeta Vastralaya, you can buy good cotton clothes of all range and for every one.

title: Divine Place
review: The Divine Place , it is place for Satsang start early morning 04:00 am till 07:00 am on Gita , In afternoon around 12 Noon to 14:00 on Ram Katha and in evening around 17:00  to 19:00 on Shiv Mahiman , if you interested in this than only you can stay their, It is like your home in Swargashram .They very big property more than 1Km area with them in front ''Maa Ganga" very divine places you can only feel it . They provide meal at very economical rate with very good quality simple thali.

title: Nice place to stay
review: Nice place to stay and comparatively cheaper than others. U will find mostly old people staying here. Next to the river ganga. They have a small shop too if u wanna buy anything.

title: This place to relax
review: It is close to Laxman  Jhoola and never too crowded . There is nothing much here except the books to buy . But , I was recommended this place by someone .,

title: No Frill Genuine Place
review: The Gita Bhavan has a place to stay,eat,and shop for clothes, aryavedic products,and publications.I found the prices most reasonable and products of right quality.As the Gita Bhavan is a charitable organisation,profiteering does not appear to be the motive.

title: Jai Shree Ram
review: If you are visiting Rishikesh then you must visit Geeta Bhavan..Ganga Aarti also help near Geeta Bhawan ( 100 Meters ) and famous Geeta Press counter also located outside the Geeta Bhavan...

title: known for Hindu religious books
review: The Gita Bhavans are part of Gita press, the press which publishes the Hindu religious literature. This place is also famous for its cloth store, sweet shop n Ayurvedic pharmacy.

title: "Jai Ganga maiyaa"
review: Really Nice palace to visit there in Rishikesh.....for a hindu religiosity.....

title: Gita Bhavan
review: One must visit GITA Bhawan when you are in Rishikesh. Here you will get very valuable books about Hindu Religion and about Bhagavad Gita

title: A HEAVENLY ABODE ON EARTH
review: Gita Bhavan is situated near bank of Ganga is charming for religious minded people.It is free lodging,economic canteen facility as well as free bedding too

title: Best Ayurvedic pharmacy.
review: Best products, made at the ashram behind and prayed upon. Best prices and choices of the rarest products. Also great textile shop next door.

title: nice experience
review: probably has one of the oldest and rare collection of ancient literature on Gita. The entire campus has a religious feeling. There are big trees in the campus. The images and idols of Gita are not only of academic interest, they are also beautifully maintained. there are facility like free food and economical lodging.

title: peaceful and calm
review: Go there if you are religiously inclined.

title: Peaceful
review: A peaceful place. Must drop in, even if you are there for few hours. There are few shops around, if you wish u can buy few things for there. They are pretty fair and do not try to push any sale.

title: For Local Swadeshi purchase
review: It's near to Ram jhula, in between you can find some temples. Good collection for Khadhi work. Nice swadeshi collection. Can purchase bedsheet , towels , suits .

title: Holidays in Rishikesh
review: Nice Place to see. You can stay here free. Divine atmosphere. Old type but very clean. If you hire guide, he can give you more information on history of the place.

title: The Gita Bhavan
review: We crossed the river by boat and visited the Gita Bhavan, It is beautiful. Gita is written all over, lovely statues connected with stories of lord Ram and Krishna. The temples inside are also very beautiful, Enjoyed walking there.

title: A Peaceful place
review: Another attraction near Ramjhula not be missed. A Vast clean well maintained place.Has aLaxminarayan Temple.You can buy various localstuff at reasonable rates.You can spend hours if you are spiritually inclined.A Good place to visit.

title: Peaceful environment
review: The ambiance was excellent and peaceful. Enjoyed the afternoon with the spirituality of the area and the lecture being delivered at that time.

title: A spiritual visit
review: This Ashram has been built by the Gorakhpur based Gita Press that sells spiritual and religious books at very reasonable rates. The Ashram houses a beautiful Vishnu Lakshmi Mandir and has the Gita inscribed in a very small space. The Ashram also has a well maintained Ghat where a holy dip can be taken.

title: Spiritual place
review: Another divine place near Ramjhula which can not be missed. The Ashram was built by the Gorakhpur based Gita Press - sellers of the spiritual and religious books.  There is nice temple of Laxmi Narayan. Overall a well maintained place.

title: Buy all your Religious Books here
review: I go there to buy any religious text that I need. They have a vast collection and it is worth the visit. I always pick something or the other up.

title: Nice
review: Old one, for religious values, many temples inside also for stay at affordable prices but have to book well in advance

title: A PLACE TO CONNECT WITH YOURSELF
review: Gita bhawan,is a bhanwan engaged in various religious,spiritual activities.

title: worth a visit
review: Gita bhavan has its own share of rishikesh spirituality. Situated on the bank of majestic ganga, it offers hundreds of rooms to devotees in its seven complexes (as told to me by the guide). The main feature of gita bhavan is its publication house which sells a large number of books on religious and spirituality at a through away price.

title: plenty of staff, zero customer service
review: They all seemed to be in some kind of trance, sitting and just starring at their own thoughts - no one knew the answer to any questions, or cared to find out. Some just outright ill mannered. Very poor selection in general, highly overrated, total waste of time with one exception - the only place in the village one could sometimes find decent looking nightwear for ladies.  Indian style, of course, and they do get new things in at times, you have to go and see yourself.

title: A Place of Spirituality
review: Gita bhawan is mainly for spiritual meditation and devotional stay. It is situated on the left  bank of the river Ganga. It's location is very attrctive and full of tranquility. Though the facilities for stay are not very good but for a short visit, it is fine. Sitting here on the bank of river is very enjoyable. Outside there is a shop of Gitapress Gorakhpur where one can by holy books/ scriptures of Hinduism at nominal price and cloths of Gitapress Shop are also nice.Located at Ram/ Shivanand Jhula.

title: Search for Spiritual life / Soul Searching
review: One may find peaceful , true spiritual touch at the bank of river ganges. Any one who is looking for salvation/ bhakti can live at GITA BHAWAN at no cost. It is a place of many great saints who spent there some part of their life  and delivered spiritual lecture / shared their learning about  life.

title: Gita Bhavan - visit
review: You can get in site for calm and quite atmosphere. You can also see the Rudraksha tree there. When we visited, we could not get any of those rudrakshas as no season. It is understood that they provide free accommodation for people who participate the Gita patan there.

title: Worth a visit
review: Gita Bhavan is located close to Ram Jhula in Rishikesh and is worth a visit for tourists and all spiritualism seekers. Nice temple of Laxmi Narayan in the complex. One can buy Hindu religious books,ayurvedic medicines, Rudraksha necklace, many types of gem stones and traditional clothes at reasonable rates.

title: Good place to spiritualism seekers
review: Religious books,simple satvik food,Ayurvedic medicines and Indian sweets at reasonable rates.

title: Gita Bhavan – Refresh Your Senses
review: This place is located right on the bank of river Ganges and is quite popular with the locals. I visited this place with my family and they loved its location and their serene experience there. After some time we had local food there, which was equally tasty and very cheap!!

title: Worth to visit
review: I have been to rishikesh and i would suggest to visit it once if you are first time to rishikesh. Very large ashram and i think the senior people just love this place. There is also temple in the middle. The story of lord krishna you can view in pictures.

title: I met my inner peace
review: A great place on the banks of the ganga, so quite so serene.  I have never visited such a  divine place in my entire life.

title: great ambiance
review: i like the surrounding and beautiful atmosphere of geeta bhavan very spiritual .There is one school which s giving free education to poor children s  .

title: ideally located
review: its situated on the otherside of ganga river in rishikesh you have to cross the barge and go if we are going by vehicle or cross by the laxman jhula by walk, a good place, parmarth and swarg ashram are adjacent

title: Peaceful, nice garden ambience with a temple in the middle.
review: The place has a serenity to it, the temple being set amidst nice gardens---though the overall campus is not very large.   There is cleanliness and surely the sense of divinity.

title: Nice place to know about our culture
review: It is a very nice and interesting place to know more about Hinduism and the rich mythologies. Nice shops as well to buy churans!

title: Pure taste of authentic satvik food
review: Drop in here for some great sweets and ladoos and also fresh puri bhaji. The rates are very reasonable and the food quality best. Dont miss a try..

title: Buy Churan from here
review: This is a great place if you wish to buy ayurvedic stuff and interesting churans. You can also buy kurta material and other dirt cheap traditional garments.

title: Great Experience for those Interested in Hindu Spirituality
review: This a place to find your inner peace and tranquility. On both sides of the main gate are shops selling ayurvedic medicines, books about Hindu religion and clothes and memorabilia bearing Hindu symbols. At the centre of the inner compound lies a small temple. In front of the temple, devotees sit and recite/chant verses from the Gita all day long. Its a serene and mystical experience for spiritual people. All the inner walls in the compound are painted with verses from the Gita, though in Hindi. You can easily spend half an hour to one hour here.

title: Calm Quiet and peaceful Laxmi Narayan temple is awesome.
review: I like the Calm Quiet and peaceful Laxmi Narayan temple is awesome. Surrounded by sprawling park and the accommodation for the pilgrims.

title: ok
review: Although I am don't like to visit temples, I visited here with my family. It was a nice place to relax in the Temple compound particularly if you are tired of coming allover from crossing ram Jhula. We relaxed and meditated for an hour after ahaving quite heavy lunch at Chotiwala

title: Peace & Quiet
review: The temple does not encourage any kind of donation & had notices placed to this effect. This seemed quite unusual.

title: peaceful
review: Right next to flowing ganga it is like a mythological place full of peace , soul awareness , simple life style , meditation , religious discourses , yoga , mythological education . An occasional dose won't harm anyone .

title: must see the gita in gita bhavan on the wall
review: must see the gita in gita bhavan on the wall only in very small area all gita comes.please at once. also good ashram to visit

title: Rishikesh visit incomplete without visiting Geeta Bhavan
review: Brilliant evening aarti, must experience - the hymns and the atmosphere - check out the videos on youtube

title: nice place to stay
review: if you want to enjoy the yoga, the parmarth niketan aarti - it is the best place after parmarth niketan. on bank of river GANGA and very near to market.

title: Nice
review: Actually it is very nice to see from Laxman jhula. And from the bhavan the view of ganges is very good.

title: Amazing Goodies
review: Gita Bhawan has an eateries outlet as you come down from Ram Jhul and start moving towards Gita Bhawan. This place is just out of this world. Their preparations are mouth watering and at such throw away prices. Do not miss out on their boondi the next time you visit the place.

title: peace and serinity
review: you can be here for hours , hear the birds and you are in midst of greenery

title: A must visit for a Hindu
review: This is one place where you can spend the whole day learning about Sanatana (aka Hindu) Dharma.

title: Good quality food
review: Good food and quick service. Enjoyed specially 'poori-sabzi' and 'kaju-katli'. My kids enjoyed the potato chips. It is very affordable too

title: Old monument
review: It is an old monument worth visiting. I was interested in the publications of Gorakhpur Press. One can stay and eat at Geeta Bhavan it is like a dharmashala. The pictorial presentation of Ramayana and Krishnavatar is very good.

title: its the best
review: gita bhavan is a great playou would go ce to visit if you wanna go lakshman or ram jhula you would go gita bhavan first its a type of whole day trip fistly go and do boat , rafting shop and have fun you will find choti wala also eat there its yum

title: No improvements in years ...
review: As I visited this place after 33 years and it was same as I have seen earlier. No improvements in facility except book stall outside it's premises.

title: Pure Ghee Sweets... Must Try
review: Hygienic food at reasonable price ... Hot Jelabis and Samosas are must try. Food here is prepared with pure Ghee.

title: one of the oldest collections in Gita Bhawan
review: The Gita Bhawan in Rishikesh is probably has one of the oldest and rare collection of ancient literature on Gita. The entire campus has a religious feeling. There are big trees in the campus. The images and idols of Gita are not only of academic interest, they are also beautifully maintained.

title: Mental Peace
review: The moment you enter this place you feel so much of peace and tranquility within your heart and soul that you are left speechless.

title: A township - spiritual and self contained
review: Gita Bhawan is a venture of the Gita Press Gorakhpur and houses ascetics and those who seek emancipation. Lot of people come here seeking to luberate themselves and lot of worship and tapasya on the banks of Maa Ganga. Hymns to Gods, simple food at affordable prices, dhyan or yoga and an opportunity to be in sync with the almighty and experience the spiritual thing. A great opportunity to open the door to the satisfied life with less of the I , me ,myself stuff. One can kind very rich people in service of humanity and the needy. Gita Bhawan is worth an experience - to live life with minimal needs, may be a dress on and one in bag and sleep in make shift arragnement if rooms are full. Survive on clean , hygenic meals at cheap rates and bathe in Ganga thrice a day. Listen to deovtional songs. Tempesl galore. Gita bhawan has a "sweet shop" which cooks mithais in deshi ghee and everything gets sold out from 6 am - 8 am....Gita Bhawan shops offer good ayurvedic products and diet for the soul in terms of spiritual books. One can stay here for months with least attachment - if one has that bent of mind,

title: Peace!!
review: there are guides available to walk you through different places of interest and importance of Swargasram, but what ever they convey is widely published in internet, if you do proper research and study, you can save some money in tour around swargashram....

title: Most Holy place near Ganga.
review: This Ashram is best and not like other ashram. You can stay here for free as they don't charge. But only families are allowed to get the room here.

title: Go go and go here
review: I visited Rishikesh with my family and stay here. It’s not like hotel. You’ll not get service like hotel. But the open space you’ll get is too good. Price is very reasonable. They have food provision as well. Ganga river is near by 1 min distance

title: GITA BHAVAN ,RISHIKESH
review: Gita Bhavan is an amazing place where Bagavad Gita is written in just two pages...all 18 chapters,apart from the rare Rudraksha Tree..Lord Krishna is all around with devotees allowed to come and stay,on first come first basus free of charge..a saintly life on the banks of Rishikesh!Fantastic place for people who love to live away from the maddening crowd of materialistic places on earth,provided you want a simple saintly life!

title: Hevean for a Krishna Devootee!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
review: If you take Bhagavadgeeta as your whole and sole manual for life, then this is the place to visit and stay.

title: Such wholesome and nutritious prasad and such beautiful and true people that are a part of it
review: Gita bhavan is the finest example of our Indian teachings...simple living, everyone is equal, everything lies in the power of the supreme. The energy in the bhawan is so lovely and pure. And the Prasad served at such a nominal rate is cooked and served with such love that one feels nourished not just in the body but in the mind too. Speak to anyone out there and you will end up learning something more about life.

title: Worth a visit
review: Geeta Bhavan is situated close to Ghats and has a large compound where devotees can stay at a nominal price , a canteen which serves really delicious food ( Desi ghee sweets in particular ) and a book centre and shopping place. Its almost on the banks of ganga in Swargashram area and hence very convenient for attending Aarti or taking dip in the holy water

title: Beautiful place. lot of devotion.. people were nice
review: Beautiful place. lot of devotion.. people were nice , busy place but very nice.. and all around the place there is a subtle devotion, no gimmick as in next door Parmarth Niketan.. Will come here again and again.
